originalText.text: The team is so caring and attentive. Our dog has a urinary issue and everyone was so kind and helpful in navigating treatment, payment options and after care follow up, they stayed late and cared for Klee like he was their own dog. Thank you.

text.text: The team is so caring and attentive. Our dog has a urinary issue and everyone was so kind and helpful in navigating treatment, payment options and after care follow up, they stayed late and cared for Klee like he was their own dog. Thank you.

originalText.text: Amazing staff, wonderful atmosphere. For the first time ever, my cat was not stressed about his physical and even had fun exploring the room. Dr. Rosenblum is very knowledgeable and wonderful. She diagnosed an issue that’s very rare in cats and helped my cat get better!

text.text: Amazing staff, wonderful atmosphere. For the first time ever, my cat was not stressed about his physical and even had fun exploring the room. Dr. Rosenblum is very knowledgeable and wonderful. She diagnosed an issue that’s very rare in cats and helped my cat get better!

originalText.text:
I was recommended Bond Vet by an emergency room veterinarian when she was made aware I wouldn’t have all  the funds for my cat to be seen. I was told I was better off using Bond Vet for quality care that can work with my finances.

From the moment I walked in the staff was warm and welcoming. When my cat and I were greeted by the team, it was a vet and nurse who we’re calm with Loki easy to talk to and seemed genuinely concerned for my cat. She presented many options and answered my questions about them and helped me apply for financial help and even gave me a little discount to help my cat out. Talking to the vet felt like a dialogue never one sided where they know all and I must listen. They understood I know my cat better the anyone and only I have valuable knowledge of his past and well being and worked with me for the best of my cat.
I cant recommend Bond Vet enough. It was a much less stressful vet visit then usual for my cat and myself. I even received a follow up email asking about my cats progress the next day.

originalText.text: Bond Vet and especially everyone at the 91st St location have been amazing. Our old vet closed her practice during COVID and when we got a new puppy, we didn't know where to go. Bond has helped with everything from shots to neutering to sick visits and my pup loves going there. They are very kind and informative, and in all my experience, very transparent with costs and treatment options. Highly recommend.

text.text: Bond Vet and especially everyone at the 91st St location have been amazing. Our old vet closed her practice during COVID and when we got a new puppy, we didn't know where to go. Bond has helped with everything from shots to neutering to sick visits and my pup loves going there. They are very kind and informative, and in all my experience, very transparent with costs and treatment options. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: The staff couldn’t be nicer or more professional, Dr. Rosenblum and her team couldn’t be nicer. They took their time to explain all the possible treatment options and were very knowledgeable and reassuring. Teddy required follow ups and additional treatments for allergies, the staff were very accommodating on fitting him to their busy schedule. Happy to report Teddy made a full recovery. So lucky to to have such a gifted team so close
